entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
